sitename: Eco Strike Pest Control | Pest Control in Coarsegold, Oakhurst & Mountain Communities
cleaned_text: Non-toxic methods include the use of trapping, glue boards or using pheromones. The pheromones are what attract a specific pests to be caught without using pesticides. Another non-toxic application are glue boards. Glue boards involve placement in certain areas to catch a pest by knowing it's behavior and patterns. One of the oldest forms of non-toxic treatments involve trapping. Trapping is using a mechanical device to catch a certain pest. This includes the use of snap traps for catching mice. These methods are impractical to use just by themselves. They are only added tools to the green pest control we provide.
